com.soen.risk.startegies

Class RiskCheaterStrategy

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.soen.risk.startegies.RiskCheaterStrategy
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    RiskPlayerStrategy, java.io.Serializable

    public class RiskCheaterStrategy
extends java.lang.Object
implements RiskPlayerStrategy, java.io.Serializable

    Risk Cheater Strategy

    The Class RiskCheaterStrategy strategy whose reinforce() method doubles the number of armies on all its countries, whose attack() method automatically conquers all the neighbors of all its countries, and whose fortify() method doubles the number of armies on its countries that have neighbors that belong to other players.
    Version:
    3.0
    Author:
    Chirag Vora, Yogesh Nimbhorkar
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
